column4: can anyone reproduce that latest flash and firefox on 64bit doesn't work in US on hulu?
my 32 bit system works, my 64 bit doesn't (flash is correctly installed) stopped working at last update
even works under wine on my 64 bit box
Mine worked out of the box.
update happened yesterday on my box
Can you provide more details regarding the issue?
I'll hafta check, let me boot into it brb
I get the message as though I'm using a proxy
Okay, I just booted into my Ubuntu 9.10 Desktop installation, and there was no update for flash.
what version of flash are you using?
if its repos its the 32 bit plugin and nspluginwrapper

Likely. That's what I used to have to do with Debian, except that this was all done automatically so I have to inspect to see what exactly was installed. I see by synaptic flashplugin-installer is installed... but that's not particularly revealing
I'll try installing from synaptic, worried about performance, but I'd rather have functionality
About 90% of any performance boost I've ever achieved via customizing my system has been via a handrolled kernel.
